alert.note: Alert for Boone; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:30PM CDT until April 20 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Marion County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Boone County in north central Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorm was located just north of Diamond City and over Lead Hill, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Diamond City... Lead Hill... Willis... Price Place... Ozark Isle... South Lead Hill... Peel... Oakland... Monarch... Bull Shoals Lake... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
